text: @fred_guttenberg @joncoopertweets These fools need to bring their own PPE & ventilators with them when they come to the overwhelmed hospital in a couple of weeks. There may be a treatment for #coronavirus but there is no cure for stupid. (Btw, these people will vote in November).
